scripts.serve: npm run prep-dist && parcel dev/index.html dev/frame.html dev/frame-load.js --open
scripts.prep-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r dev/img dist
scripts.prep-prod: npm run prep-dist && rm -rf prod && cp -r dev prod
scripts.build-prod: npm run prep-prod && spago bundle-app --to prod/index.js && parcel build prod/index.html
scripts.gen-css: tailwindcss build css/tailwind_inputs.css -o dev/tailwind.css && cat dev/tailwind.css | ./css/css2purs.py > src/Tailwind.purs
scripts.lock-css: npm run bundle && npm run css-purge && cat prod/tailwind.css | ./css/css2purs.py > src/Tailwind.purs
